title: Bajaj Finance net profit jumps 80% YoY in March quarter - Moneycontrol
content: Bajaj Finance net profit jumps 80% YoY in March quarter  Moneycontrol
description: Bajaj Financeâ€™s net interest income (NII) surged 30 percent y-o-y to Rs 6,068 crore in the March quarter. The other large component of its revenues was in the form of fees and other income of Rs 1,164 crore, up 51 percent from the same period last year
